snippet.title: Markus Ritter - A lost family Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the first trailer of our FMV Game based in Vienna, Markus Ritter - A lost familiy. 

You play Markus, a guy just trying to live his life suddenly confronted with the past of his family and the burden that comes with the name Ritter.

The amazing Title-Song written and sung by Tina Mali. 
https://music.apple.com/us/artist/tina-mali/295638490
Please find more of her music on:
https://www.tinamali.co.uk
and follow Tina Mali on:
https://www.facebook.com/tinamalimusic
and
https://www.instagram.com/Tinamali_

Studio: Flimmer Soft
